titles.title: I've Got A New Joy, Since I Found Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've got a new joy, since I found Jesus.
I've got a new joy, since I found Him.
I've got a new joy in my heart,
New hope in my soul,
I've got a new joy, since I found Him.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I've got a new peace, since I found Jesus.
I've got a new peace since I found Him.
I've got that peace that passeth all understanding.
I've got a new peace since I found Him.
